name: Breaking Ground (Vikfro, MunroMunro)
description:
Summary:
A short action platformer. The ground breaks every 7 seconds and the goal is to reach the bottom of this pit filled of monsters alive.

--------
Controls:
Press alt+enter to toggle fullscreen in the HTML version.

Hotkeys are rebindable in the "hotkeys" menu from the main menu. Defaults are:

A and D to move left and right

Space to jump

J to attack

--------
Credits:
Munro:
game design, music, art

Vikfro:
programming

Cartoonist and IcedQuinn:
additional art
